title: WTB: N-28 Keefe and Ward - graded Ex

posts.post_title: WTB: N-28 Keefe and Ward - graded Ex
posts.post_content:
Posted By: E. Angyal
Looking for Keefe and Ward from the N-28 set in graded PSA 5, SGC 60, or SGC 70 condition.  Would be interested in GAI Ex or Ex+ as well.  Please e-mail me at angyale@att.net if you might be able to help me out.  Thanks in advanced,

Eric

posts.post_title: WTB: N-28 Keefe and Ward - graded Ex
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Gilbert Maines
That sounds great!
I want those cards too!
But I can not put enough into them to get such high grades.
Heck, the most I will spend is $250 per card.
And please include the N29 Ewing in there too.

or

Surprise me with a n43 Ewing, and I will do what I can.

identify7@peoplepc.com
